home.heroDescription: Create schedule polls or surveys for your team quickly and easily. Start without registration or use your account for extended features.
home.featureNoRegistrationDesc: Create polls instantly without signing up. Receive links via email.
home.featureCalendarDesc: Schedule planning with intuitive calendar view and timezone support.
home.featureShareDesc: QR codes, email invitations and direct links for maximum reach.
home.featureLiveResultsDesc: Track results in real-time with fullscreen presentation for meetings and training.
home.featureGdprDesc: Secure data processing according to German data protection standards.
home.featureExportDesc: CSV and PDF export for documentation and further use.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Get to the perfect vote in just a few steps
home.step1Desc: Choose between schedule poll and classic survey. Add options and configure your settings.
home.step2Desc: Share the link via email, QR code or directly with your team. No registration required for participants.
home.step3Desc: Track voting in real-time, export results and make informed decisions.
home.ctaDescription: Start your first poll today and experience how easy team coordination can be.

pollCreation.formRestored: Your inputs have been restored. You can now submit the poll.
pollCreation.formRestoredOrga: Your inputs have been restored. You can now submit the organization list.
pollCreation.loginRequiredDescription: This email address belongs to a registered account. Please log in. Your inputs will be saved.
pollCreation.expiryHint: Voting is not possible after this date.
pollCreation.expiryHintOrga: Sign-ups are not possible after this date.
pollCreation.expiryReminderDescription: Participants will receive an email reminder before the expiry date
pollCreation.expiryTooShort: The poll ends in {{hours}} hours - too short for reminders
pollCreation.allowVoteEditDescription: Can participants change their vote afterwards?
pollCreation.allowVoteWithdrawalDescription: Can participants completely withdraw their vote?
pollCreation.linksWillBeSentTo: You will receive all links at:
pollCreation.emailNotificationDescription: You will receive a participation link, an administration link, and a QR code via email.
pollCreation.allowMultipleSlotsDescription: Can a person sign up for multiple slots?

createPoll.pageSubtitle: Find the perfect time for your team meeting or event.
createPoll.descriptionPlaceholder: Additional details about the schedule poll...
createPoll.autoSubmitDescription: Your schedule poll is being created now.
createPoll.createError: The schedule poll could not be created.
createPoll.minOptionsError: Please add at least 2 date options.

createSurvey.pageSubtitle: Gather opinions and make decisions together.
createSurvey.descriptionPlaceholder: What activities should we offer at the summer party?
createSurvey.autoSubmitDescription: Your survey is being created now.
createSurvey.createError: The survey could not be created.
createSurvey.optionsHint: Add at least 2 options for participants to choose from.
createSurvey.tipContent: Use images to make your options more visually appealing. Images help participants make decisions.

createOrganization.pageSubtitle: Create sign-up slots for events, helper lists, or contribution lists.
createOrganization.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Summer Festival Helper List or Bake Sale
createOrganization.autoSubmitDescription: Your organization list is being created now.
createOrganization.createError: The organization list could not be created.
createOrganization.minSlotsError: Please add at least one slot.
createOrganization.dayModeDateError: Please select a date for the day organization.
createOrganization.slotTimeError: Slot "{{name}}": Start time and end time must be different.
createOrganization.allowMultipleSlotsDescription: Can a person sign up for multiple slots?
createOrganization.allowEntryEditDescription: Can participants change their sign-ups afterwards?
createOrganization.allowEntryWithdrawalDescription: Can participants completely withdraw their sign-ups?
createOrganization.slotsHint: Slots can be named e.g., "2:00-2:30 PM Cake" or "Bring drinks". The capacity determines how many people can sign up per slot.
createOrganization.dayOrganizationDescription: Select the date once, then only enter times - ideal for many time slots on one day.
createOrganization.slotDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., 2:00-2:30 PM Cake or Helper Setup
createOrganization.timesMustDiffer: Start time and end time must be different

pollView.loginRequiredMessage: This poll was created by a registered user. Please log in to access the administration page.
pollView.accessDeniedMessage: You can only manage your own polls.
pollView.pollNotFoundMessage: The requested poll does not exist or is no longer available.
pollView.resultsPrivateMessage: The results of this poll are only visible to the creator.
pollView.editDialogDescription: Change the settings and options of this poll.
pollView.hasVotesWarningMessage: This poll already has {{voters}} participants with {{votes}} votes. Changes to options may affect the results.
pollView.hasVotesWarningItem1: Deleting an option will also remove all associated votes
pollView.hasVotesWarningItem2: New options will have no votes yet
pollView.title: Title
pollView.inviteDialogDescription: Invite participants via email or Matrix.
pollView.emailAddressesHint: Enter email addresses (comma or line separated)
pollView.endPollDialogDescription: Do you really want to end this poll?

toasts.changesNotSaved: The changes could not be saved.
toasts.someChangesNotSaved: Some changes could not be saved.
toasts.invitationsSentDesc: The invitations have been successfully sent.
toasts.invitationsNotSent: The invitations could not be sent.
toasts.matrixInvitesNotSent: The Matrix invitations could not be sent.
toasts.selectMatrixUser: Please select at least one Matrix user.
toasts.enterValidEmail: Please enter at least one valid email address.

myPolls.title: My Polls
myPolls.emptyCreatedDesc: You haven't created any polls yet. Create your first poll now!
myPolls.emptyParticipatedDesc: You haven't participated in any polls yet.
myPolls.calendarSubscriptionDesc: Sync your poll dates with your calendar
myPolls.calendarInfo: Subscribe to this calendar in your calendar app (Outlook, Google Calendar, Apple Calendar) to automatically sync schedule polls.

toasts.tokenRegeneratedDesc: The old link no longer works. Please update your calendar app.
toasts.linkCopied: The link has been copied to the clipboard.

pollSuccess.noDataDesc: No poll data was found. Please create a new poll.
pollSuccess.successDesc: Your {{type}} "{{title}}" has been successfully created and is ready for participants.
pollSuccess.publicLinkDesc: Share this link with all participants
pollSuccess.adminLinkDesc: For you only - for managing and editing
pollSuccess.emailNotificationHint: An email with both links will be sent to {{email}}. If you don't receive an email, please save these links.
pollSuccess.step1Desc: Send the public link to all participants via email, WhatsApp, or other communication channels.
pollSuccess.step2Desc: Use the administrator link to track voting results in real-time.
pollSuccess.step3Desc: Save the administrator link securely - only with this link can you manage your poll.

toasts.linkCopiedDesc: {{label}} has been copied to the clipboard.

voteSuccess.thankYouDesc: Your response for "{{title}}" has been successfully saved.
voteSuccess.step1Desc: You can view the current voting results at any time and follow how others vote.
voteSuccess.step2Desc: If you change your mind, you can adjust your vote at any time via the same link.
voteSuccess.step3Desc: Share the link with other people who should participate in this {{type}}.

toasts.voteWithdrawnDesc: Your vote has been successfully removed.
toasts.voteNotWithdrawn: Your vote could not be withdrawn.

surveyForm.surveyDescriptionPlaceholder: What activities should we offer at the summer party?
surveyForm.addAtLeastTwo: Add at least 2 options for participants to choose from.
surveyForm.markdownTip: You can also use Markdown to embed links or images in your options:

pollForm.scheduleDescriptionPlaceholder: Additional details about the schedule poll...
pollForm.anonymousDescription: You will receive a public link to share and a private admin link for management via email.

dashboard.managePolls: Manage your polls and schedules clearly
dashboard.sharedPollsDescription: Polls you have participated in will be displayed here.
dashboard.archiveDescription: Expired and closed polls will be archived here.

confirmEmail.emailUpdated: Your email address has been successfully updated.
confirmEmail.emailVerifiedMessage: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now use all features.

forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: If an account with this email address exists, we have sent a password reset link.
forgotPassword.checkSpam: Please also check your spam folder.
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

resetPassword.requirementsNotMet: Password does not meet all requirements (8 characters, upper/lowercase, number, special character).
resetPassword.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
resetPassword.setNewPasswordDescription: Set a new secure password for your account.

imageUpload.altTextHelp: Alternative text helps visually impaired users understand the image content.
imageUpload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP
